name: SmartLink Pro 4K HDMI Cable
description: Experience ultra-high-definition streaming and gaming with the SmartLink Pro 4K HDMI Cable. Designed to support resolutions up to 4K at 60Hz, this durable cable ensures seamless connectivity for TVs, monitors, and gaming consoles. Its gold-plated connectors and triple-layer shielding reduce signal interference, delivering crystal-clear visuals and audio. Perfect for home theaters or professional setups.
